result.execSummary:
The defendant Karen L. Clarke was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Bail Jumping-Misdemeanor, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
Pay costs of supervision and court costs.  Clerk notes that costs in this matter, including the DNA surcharge, were paid in full out of the defendant's bond money at the time of case disposition.
Concurrent with: 14CT41

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Karen L. Clarke

defendant.name: Clarke, Karen L.

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
ADA Forehand for the State.  Def and Atty. McDougal for the Defense.  14CT41 and 15CM3/status.  Atty. M informs the Court that the parties have an agreement for resolution of both matters which includes a probation dispo on the OWI 4th.

Def pleads guilty to OWI 4th in 14CT41 and bail jumping in 15CM3.  Court's colloquy re pleas.  Finding of guilty.

11 days credit due in 15CM3.  0 days in 14CT41.

14CT41 - OWI 4th - Court's sentence is 245 days jail,imposed/stayed for probation with 29 days as conditional time.  AODA treatment.  $2072.  36 mo revocation.  36 mo IID upon relicensing.  Probation 2 years.  Follow all rules/regs of probation.  Attend, pay for, successfully complete any counseling/programs recommended by agent.  Huber granted on both the stayed jail and the jail that's a condition of probation.  0 days credit.  $62 costs to county.  Jail stayed until on or before May 1, 2015 between 6-7 a.m.

Clarification on the sentence structure:  245 days imposed/stayed in lieu of probation of 2 years.  Probation condition is the 29 days jail time.  If defendant is revoked from probation, these 29 days may be used as credit towards the 245.

15CM3 - 2 years probation, concurrent, with costs and 11 days credit.

Defendant Karen L. Clarke not in court. Prosecuting Atty Amy Elizabeth Forehand appeared for State of Wisconsin. Attorney Lisa A McDougal in court for Defendant Karen L. Clarke by written authorization for 15CM3 and 14CT41.  Atty. M states the parties may have reached an agreement; asks for setover to April 1 at 1:30 for status.  Status conference scheduled for April 1, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

ADDRESS INFO for Karen L. Clarke
Current: 41582 County Rd X, Soldiers Grove, WI 54655 United States  (Effective: 01-07-2015)
Prior: 41582 County Rd X #b, Soldiers Grove, WI 54655
Bond amount lowered to $500 cash.  Conditions remain the same as the previous bond.

Defendant Karen L. Clarke in court with attorney Lisa A. McDougal. Prosecuting Atty Amy Forehand appeared for State of Wisconsin.  Formal reading waived.  NG entered.  Atty. M asks for lower cash bail - def cannot post.  ADA objects.  Court reduces bond to $500 cash with same conditions as original bond.  Status requested and set.  Status conference scheduled for February 4, 2015 at 01:30 pm.
